text: The forties, seventies, and the nineties, when money was scarce, were great periods, when the art world retracted but it was also reborn.
author: Jerry Saltz

text: Money is something that can be measured art is not. It's all subjective.
author: Jerry Saltz

text: Art usually only makes the news in America when the subject is money.
author: Jerry Saltz

text: Not to say people shouldn't get rich from art. I adore the alchemy wherein artists who cast a complex spell make rich people give them their money. (Just writing it makes me cackle.) But too many artists have been making money without magic.
author: Jerry Saltz
